ability.Speed Boost: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage at the end of each turn.
ability.Razor Fin: This Pokemon's biting moves have their power increased by 50%.

Crunch.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Liquidation.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Fin Slash.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
